books.title: The Hobbit
books.description: A classic fantasy novel by J.R.R. Tolkien about the home-loving hobbit Bilbo Baggins who is whisked away by Gandalf and thirteen dwarves on a perilous quest to reclaim their lost treasure from the dragon Smaug.

books.title: The Lord of the Rings
books.description: An epic fantasy trilogy following Frodo Baggins and the quest to destroy the One Ring.

books.title: Murder on the Orient Express
books.description: Detective Hercule Poirot investigates a murder aboard the luxurious Orient Express train.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
books.description: Harry discovers he is a wizard and attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
